name: Sinusoidality
description:
Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022 -- Theme: Duality. An infinite runner where you jump over spikes along a sine wave. Photosensitivity warning: contains some contrasting, fast-moving, and flashing colors.

All programming, assets, music, and sounds done by Giovanni L. 

All music and sounds (except the drums) were recorded using the Roland Alpha Juno 2 synthesizer.

Developed using the C# Monogame framework.

Controls:

Jump up: Up Arrow, W key, Right Trigger

Jump down: Down Arrow, S key, Left Trigger

Change resolution: F key

End game: Escape key
